report.title: UKBMS sampling locations (except BBS, confidential or historic) 2
report.description: All UKBMS sampling locations except WCBS-BBS, confidential or historic locations. Experimental version of report that includes improvements to termlists_term and samples joins.
report.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT lav.int_value as confidential, lav2.int_value as historic, l.id as id, l.name as name, ctt.term as type, l.location_type_id as ltype, l.code as lcode, l.centroid_sref as centroid_sref, COUNT(DISTINCT sp.id) as samples, COUNT(DISTINCT extract(YEAR from sp.date_start)) as n_year, min(extract(YEAR from sp.date_start)) first_year, max(extract(YEAR from sp.date_start)) last_year, l.code as code, st_x(st_centroid(st_transform(l.centroid_geom, 4326))) as lon, st_y(st_centroid(st_transform(l.centroid_geom, 4326))) as lat FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON l.id=lw.location_id AND lw.deleted=false left JOIN cache_samples_functional sp ON sp.location_id=l.id AND sp.website_id=27 join cache_termlists_terms ctt on l.location_type_id = ctt.id left join location_attribute_values lav on l.id = lav.location_id AND lav.location_attribute_id = 245 AND lav.deleted=false left join location_attribute_values lav2 on l.id = lav2.location_id AND lav2.location_attribute_id = 322 AND lav2.deleted=false WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id in (777, 5196) AND lw.website_id=27 group by l.id, ctt.term, lav.int_value, lav2.int_value order by samples asc, name) as subsel where (ltype=777 or samples>0) and (confidential is NULL or confidential = 0) and (historic is NULL or historic = 0)
